response.overview: The romance comedy, helmed by Singapore director Boi Kwong (Geylang, The Days), brings together a cast that includes Singaporean influencers Simonboy, Mayiduo (Kelvin Tan), Tommy Wong & Germaine Chow, alongside Malaysian actress Grace Teo and popular Thai influencer Fah Chatchaya Suthisuwan (aka Fahhaha). Also making special appearances in the movie will be Thai superstar Ananda Everingham (Shutter, The Cursed Land) and wildly popular Thai actress Prang Kannarun Wongkajornklai (Love Destiny television series) in vital roles.
response.title: 3 Good Guys
